name: Welltech Funding
overview:
Launched in January 2012, Welltech Funding is a business accelerator for bringing to market companies that are innovating consumer-focused health and wellness solutions.

Welltech Funding will make available to selected companies a minimum investment of $50,000, plus office space (including phones and utilities).

Welltech Funding has an affiliation with SpaFinder, Inc., an industry leader in health and wellness.
